sentences.en: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.cn: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.en: Cast your mind back to 1978, when Forest won the title.
sentences.cn: 回想一下1978年福里斯特赢得冠军称号的时候。

sentences.en: Gary Kasparov has retained his title as world chess champion.
sentences.cn: 加雷·卡斯帕罗夫卫冕了他国际象棋世界冠军的称号。

sentences.en: Her official title is editor.
sentences.cn: 她的正式职称是编辑。

sentences.en: Hibernian clinched the First Division title when they beat Hamilton 2-0.
sentences.cn: 希伯尼安队以2比0战胜汉密尔顿队，夺得了甲级联赛的冠军。

sentences.en: His working title for the script was "Trust the People".
sentences.cn: 他给这个剧本暂定的标题是《相信人民》。

sentences.en: I turned around and wrote the title on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我转过身，在黑板上写下了题目。

sentences.en: Kane won the world title in 1938 when he outpointed Jackie Durich.
sentences.cn: 1938年，凯恩以点数击败杰基·杜里克，获得了世界拳王称号。

sentences.en: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.cn: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.en: Richard Dunwoody is in front in the jockeys' title race.
sentences.cn: 理查德·邓伍迪在职业赛马骑师冠军赛中领先其他选手。

sentences.en: Steffi Graf claimed a fourth Wimbledon title in 1992.
sentences.cn: 施特菲·格拉芙于1992年第4次赢得温布尔登桂冠。

sentences.en: The heavyweight champion will be given a shot at Holyfield's world title.
sentences.cn: 这名重量级拳击冠军将尝试挑战霍利菲尔德的世界冠军头衔。

sentences.en: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.cn: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

sentences.en: The title is per-haps an allusion to AIDS.
sentences.cn: 该题目可能暗指艾滋病。

sentences.en: the UK’s 20 best-selling titles
sentences.cn: 英国20种最畅销的书

sentences.en: The vacant W.B.C. junior-lightweight title has been called off.
sentences.cn: 空缺的世界拳击理事会次轻量级头衔被取消了。

sentences.en: This title was a best seller and is now available in softback.
sentences.cn: 这种书曾经畅销一时，现在推出了平装本。

sentences.en: This title will only pass down through the male line.
sentences.cn: 这个头衔将只能传给男性后裔。

sentences.en: This will be his eighth title bout in 19 months.
sentences.cn: 这将是他19个月里的第8次卫冕赛。

sentences.en: United are still my tip for the Title.
sentences.cn: 我仍然认定联队会夺冠。

words.tran_cn: 加标题于；授予…称号（title的过去分词）
冠军的；[计][图情]标题的；头衔的
加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为

phrases.tran_cn: 权利证书；法定权利，合法业权
官衔；正标题， 原书名
剧名角色；片名角色（戏剧或电影中其名被用作剧名或片名的）

trans.tran_cn: 标题，头衔，[体]冠军，[影视]字幕，职位
trans.tran_en: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

trans.tran_cn: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
trans.tran_en: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

trans.tran_cn: 加标题，赋予头衔，把…称为
